a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Per capita meat consumption in the United States
Average per capita meat availability, measured in kilograms per year. This data does not account for
consumption-level waste, and therefore actual per capita intake will be slightly lower than meat availability.
Data source: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (2023)
